metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1419 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description:
Race condition in the power policy functions in policy-funcs in acpi-support before 0.142 allows local users to gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1419` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

acpi-support - 0.142
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> policy-funcs was dropped in acpi-support 0.142

criterions.comment: acpi-support package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.142').
